field.label: Subnet
field.help: Subnet to use, should be large enough to hold the specified pools and reservations

field.label: Interface
field.help: Select which interface this subnet belongs too.

field.label: Allocator
field.help: Select allocator method to use when offering leases to clients.

field.label: PD Allocator
field.help: Select allocator method to use when offering prefix delegations to clients

field.label: Description
field.help: You may enter a description here for your reference (not parsed).

field.label: Pools
field.help: List of pools, one per line in range or subnet format (e.g. 2001:db8:1::-2001:db8:1::100, 2001:db8:1::/80

field.label: DNS servers
field.help: DNS servers to offer to the clients

field.label: Domain search
field.help: Specifies a ´search list´ of Domain Names to be used by the client to locate not-fully-qualified domain names.
